case_summary.outcome: Total loss - website offline, no fund recovery

investment_mechanism.investment_structure: Group investment via shared wallet address
investment_mechanism.fund_transfer_method: Direct transfer to specific crypto wallet address

wallet_addresses.note: Specific wallet address not disclosed in complaint, but victim reported seeing wallet drained via dapp connection

attack_details: Scammers connected shared wallet to malicious dapp
Dapp drained accumulated funds from wallet
Likely used smart contract approval exploit

withdrawal_prevention.method: Funds stolen via technical exploit (not withdrawal blocking)

additional_fees_demanded.justification: Payment required to access stolen funds

red_flags: Group investment scheme with shared wallet
Request to send funds to external wallet address
No regulatory licensing or oversight mentioned
Real-time wallet draining witnessed by victim
No customer support or recovery mechanism
Extreme escalation in ransom amount vs original loss

scammer_characteristics.number_of_actors: Multiple (at least 2 - initial contact + post-theft contact)
scammer_characteristics.technical_sophistication: High - capable of dapp exploitation and smart contract attacks

victim_profile.crypto_experience: Moderate (understood wallet operations, could observe draining)
vulnerability_exploited: Desperation after loss (for secondary extortion attempt)

transfer_methods: Direct cryptocurrency transfer to wallet address

execution.description: Victim connected wallet to malicious dapp

persistence.description: Smart contract approval for ongoing fund access

privilege_escalation.description: Gained control of victim wallet via dapp permissions

iocs.malicious_dapp: Unknown dapp used for wallet draining

threat_actor_assessment.operational_security: Good - successful exit scam, evidence removal
threat_actor_assessment.targeting: Opportunistic via social media, but coordinated group operation
threat_actor_assessment.infrastructure: Professional fraudulent platform + malicious dapp capability

prevention: Never respond to unsolicited investment offers on social media
Be extremely skeptical of guaranteed daily returns
Avoid group investment schemes with shared wallets
Never approve dapp connections without thorough verification
Research platforms through official regulatory databases
Verify company employees through official channels
Understand smart contract approvals before signing
Use hardware wallets for large holdings
detection: Monitor for unrealistic return promises (>10% annually is suspicious)
Check domain registration dates and ownership
Verify platform licensing with financial regulators
Review dapp smart contracts before connecting
Watch for group investment pressure tactics
Monitor wallet for unauthorized dapp connections
Use blockchain explorers to verify wallet transactions
response: Report to IC3, FBI, FTC, and state authorities immediately
Do NOT pay secondary ransom/extortion demands
Revoke all smart contract approvals immediately
Alert other victims if part of group investment
Consult crypto recovery specialists (be wary of recovery scams)
Share information with crypto security communities
